altTitles.en: Spirit Sacrifice: The Path to Godhood
Everyone Is a King: I Sacrifice Countless Lives to Become a King

description.en:
Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life.
At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens.
With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top.
As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!

altTitles.ja: 魔女と野獣

description.en:
The stage; a city where "witches" collect people's worship. Who appeared there was a man carrying a coffin, and a girl with a beast's eyes. Their prey, "Witches"! And nothing else. When the evil "witch" and the starved "beast" meet, their magnificent and fierce battle begins!

---

- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10214/episode/314025) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/the-witch-and-the-beast/)
description.ja: 舞台は“魔女”が人々の崇拝を集める街――。そこに現れたのは、棺桶を背負う男と、獣の目をした少女。彼等の求める獲物は“魔女”、そのただ一つ。悪しき“魔女”と飢えた“野獣”が出会う時、華麗にして苛烈な戦いの幕が開く！
description.vi:
Ashaf là một anh chàng tao nhã với tác phong tinh tế, mang theo quan tài và đoàn tùy tùng quạ đen. Còn Guideau lại là một cô gái hoang dại, đầy bạo lực, với cặp răng nanh và đôi mắt như loài dã thú.
Bỗng một ngày, bộ đôi kỳ lạ này đặt chân đến thành phố bị thống trị bởi phù thủy - người được tung hô như một vị anh hùng nơi đây. Nhưng cả Ashaf và Guideau đều biết rõ: "Phù thủy là những kẻ mang đến sự nguyền rủa và tai ương". Không một ai có thể cản bước họ, dù có là đám đông phẫn nộ hay là cả một đội quân đi chăng nữa...
Một câu chuyện cổ tích u ám mang phong cách Steampunk & Gothic, đậm đà chất ma thuật! "Phù thủy và Quái thú" chắc chắn sẽ lôi cuốn bất cứ độc giả nào đang ngóng chờ một tựa truyện thể loại hành động và kỳ ảo mới toanh.

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

title.en: Uesugi-kun Wants to Quit Being a Girl

altTitles.ja: 上杉くんは女の子をやめたい

description.en: Uesugi-kun is a boy who's as petite and cute as a girl. He has a crush on a girl he's known since childhood, but overheard her saying, "Wouldn't Uesugi be totally adorable if he was a girl?!" Uesugi-kun's not as tall as his other childhood friend, Eito, nor is he as good at studies, and now he's suffering from a broken heart. A depressed Uesugi-kun stops by a shrine while running an errand and makes a wish... A love-triangle romantic comedy featuring an overly cute, and now female, protagonist begins!

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…

description.en: Roland is known throughout the world as the Black Knight. He appears calm, cool, and collected on the outside, but secretly he’s anything but - he can’t talk to girls for the life of him. One day, while doing his regular heroic thing, he comes across a slave girl bound and gagged. Roland suddenly realizes - if he saves this slave girl, he can slowly build up his social skills by talking to her. After all, a slave girl has to be as shy as him, right?
description.ja: 悪しき者共から人々を守る高潔な黒騎士、ローランド。彼には一つの悩みがあった。アラサー、独身、女性不信。親や周りの人から結婚を期待されるも、女性への免疫はゼロ。そんな彼が思い至った、素晴らしい(？)女性克服方法。「奴隷の女の子なら、自分にも優しくしてくれるのでは…？」しかし、ローランドが運命的な出会いを果たしたのは、イメージとは180度違う、明るすぎる奴隷少女、ジェシカだった…！

description.en: Follow the story of a maid who always teases her master.

description.ja:
いたって普通の少年、日向祥太。そんな彼は専属のメイドさん・黒椿亜梨沙と一緒に暮らしていた。
容姿端麗、頭脳明晰、何をやらせても完璧な彼だけの女の子。しかし彼女、絶対零度の無表情なうえに、祥太をことあるごとにからかいまくって、ちょっとエッチなご奉仕もしようとする謎多きメイドさんだった!!
亜梨沙に恋心を抱く祥太は、彼女にふさわしくなるために、どうにか男らしさを保とうとするが…果たして、肉食系Ｓメイドを祥太は止められるのか!!?

セクシー系漫画界の風来坊、7zu7の人気同人誌「ボクんちのメイドさんたち。」を一般誌化!!
背伸びしたい系男子が無表情メイドに迫られまくる、理性蒸発ラブコメ!!!!!
description.pt-br: Acompanhe a história de uma empregada que sempre provoca seu mestre.

description.en:
“I will take in and raise this child.”

I'm Katsuragi Ayako, thirty-\*BEEP\* years old. It's been 10 years since I took in the daughter of my late sister and her husband. My daughter's now in high school and is getting on well with her childhood friend, Aterazawa Takumi. Maybe they'll start dating? Takumi's a really nice guy, so I'm all for it.

Eh? He has something to say to me? Is it something like “Please give me your daughter.”? No way, I'm getting ahead of myself.

“Ayako-mama…… I've always loved you. Please go out with me.”

“……You like me (mama), not my daughter!?”

A super pure-love romcom where long-held feelings explode!
___
**Character Designer:** [Giuniu](https://mangadex.org/author/657f488c-ba3d-4910-8ec3-539871b99fcc)

[Alt Official Raw (Young Animal Web)](https://younganimal.com/series/5d1e949cd0b52)
description.pt-br: Esta é uma comédia romântica estrelada por uma mulher adulta de 30 anos chamada Ayako, que é confessada por um homem 10 anos mais novo dela, o estudante universitário de 20 anos, Takumi … Um homem que ela conhece como o menino "Ta-kun" que mora ao lado e que ensina sua filha adotiva desde os 10 anos. A revelação a espanta, pois ela pensava que sua filha Miu e ele eram um casal.

Valkyrie Apocalypse

description.en:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.

---
  - Alternative English Translation: [<comikey>](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ داستان جایی شروع میشه که خدایان بحث این رو به میان میاورند که انسان‌ها زنده بمانند یا نابود شوند. ولی یک والکری به تنهایی بحث را به سمتی میکشاند که به انسان‌ها اجازه یک مبارزه در مقابل خدایان داده شود. و به این شکل کور سوی امید بشریت روشن باقی میماند. سیزده خدا، سیزده انسان، در مقابل هم قرار میگیرند تا سرنوشت بشریت را مشخص کنند
description.fr: Tous les mille ans, l'ensemble des dieux, tous panthéons réunis, se réunissent au Valhalla, le paradis des âmes, lors d'une assemblée présidée par Zeus, le dieu suprême grec, afin de décider du sort des humains. Or, cette année-là, il est décidé à la quasi-unanimité de détruire l'humanité. Mais la Valkyrie Brunehilde interrompt la conférence et propose aux dieux de se mesurer aux mortels lors du tournoi de Ragnarök, pour déterminer s'ils valent vraiment la peine d'êtres anéantis. Ce tournoi opposera 13 dieux issus de diverses mythologies à 13 puissants humains qui ont fait l'histoire. Si l'humanité remporte au moins sept des 13 duels, alors les dieux épargneront l'humanité.
description.id: - In Indonesian by [Akasha](http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/akasha-record-of-ragnarok-01) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.it: - In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/record-of-ragnarok) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.ru: История начинается c собрания богов, на котором они решают судьбу человечества: убить всех или оставить в живых, согласившись в никчёмности рода людского, боги выбирают первое... Но одна валькирия выдвигает предложение: позволить богам и человечеству сразиться в битве, в качестве последнего луча надежды людей. 13 богов сразятся против 13 чемпионов людей в битвах один на один, чтобы решить, будет ли человечество жить или сгинет в могуществе божественной силы.
description.tr: Hikâye, tanrıların insanlığın yaşamasına ya da ölmesine karar vermek için bir toplantı düzenlemesi ve insanlığı yok etmeye karar vermesiyle başlar. Ancak yalnız bir Valkyrie, insanlığın hayatta kalması için son bir umut olarak tanrıların ve insanlığın son bir savaşa girmesine izin verilmesi önerisini ortaya atar. 13 tanrı, insanlığın yaşayıp yaşamayacağına karar vermek için teke tek savaşlarda 13 insan şampiyona karşı dövüşecektir.
description.uk: Історія починається зі зборів богів, на яких вирішується доля людства: життя чи смерть. Погодившись з нікчемністю людського роду, боги вибирають друге... Але одна валькірія висуває пропозицію: дозволити богам і людям битися в битві, яка стане останнім променем надії для людства. 13 богів б'ються проти 13 людських чемпіонів у битвах віч-на-віч, щоб вирішити, чи буде людство жити чи згине у могутності божественної сили.
description.es-la: Los Dioses se reúnen con el objetivo de decidir si la humanidad debe vivir o morir. Y aunque llegan a la conclusión de que debe perecer, una Valkyria propone que una lucha de dioses contra humanos para tomar tan difícil decisión. Así, 13 humanos pelearán contra 13 Dioses para resolver el destino de la humanidad.
description.pt-br: A cada 1.000 anos, as divindades se reúnem sob o conselho de Valhalla para decidir sobre o direito da humanidade de continuar vivendo, ou por sua destruição, porém desta vez os deuses estão furiosos com o descaso humano para com o planeta, pendendo passim para aniquilar toda a raça humana, porém uma única valquíria os convencem de realizar o Ragnarok, uma batalha mortal entre humanos e deuses para decidir sob sua sobrevivência, 13 humanos enfrentarão 13 deuses. Serão este humanos capazes de colidir com as poderosas divindades?

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

title.en: Kinou made Namae mo Yonde Kurenakatta Koushaku-sama ga, Kyuu ni Dekiai shitekuru no desu ga?

altTitles.ja: 昨日まで名前も呼んでくれなかった公爵様が、急に溺愛してくるのですが？@COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Kinou made Namae mo Yonde Kurenakatta Koushaku-sama ga, Kyuu ni Dekiai shitekuru no desu ga?

altTitles.zh: 昨日为止都没有唤过我的名字的公爵大人突然开始宠爱我？

altTitles.zh-hk: 昨日為止都沒有喚過我的名字的公爵大人突然開始寵愛我？

description.en:
Mariène is troubled by the transformation of her cold-blooded and merciless husband, Duke Alexia.
After a solitary marriage confined to his mansion, he suddenly proposes to her once more and dotes on her as "my goddess"!
He presents her with bouquets of flowers covered in jewels every day, and seduces her with the heart-pounding techniques of romance novels.

A redemptive love fantasy between a cold-blooded prince who found love by reverting to death and an unfortunate, calm, goddess daughter!

altTitles.ja: どく・どく・もり・もり

altTitles.en: Poison Poison Forest Forest

description.en: In the deep, deep forest. a Tamagotake mushroom fairy who has been left alone in the world after her parents were killed is chasing after the culprit, a Tsukiyotake, to take revenge on him. In the Sea of Trees, where life and death intersect, can the young Tamago take revenge on the hated Tsukiyo? An unprecedented mushroom suspense begins.
description.es-la: En el bosque profundo, profundo. Tamagotake, un hada de los hongos que se ha quedado sola en el mundo después de que mataran a sus padres, persigue al culpable, Tsukiyotake, para vengarse de él. En el Mar de árboles, donde la vida y la muerte se cruzan, ¿podrá el joven Tamago vengarse del odiado Tsukiyo? Comienza un suspenso de hongos sin precedentes.

title.en: Shi ni Modori Oujo wa Ikinobiru Tameni Yuri Harem wo Tsukuru Koto ni Shita

altTitles.ja: 死に戻り王女は生き延びるために百合ハーレムを作ることにした

altTitles.en: The Death Defying Princess Creates a Yuri Harem to Survive

description.en:
Marie, a domineering and selfish princess, faced her end under the guillotine's blade after her subjects had enough of her. But instead of staying dead, Marie finds herself back a year in the past, though no matter what she does she can never escape the fate that awaits her in a year. 

Eventually, after Marie learns that the only way to escape her own execution is to conquer a large swathe of 'romantically troubled' women, she decides to use her own 'royal charisma' to build a yuri harem!

A survival yuri fantasy about a princess who defies death is about to begin!
description.ja:
独裁ワガママ王女のマリーは、国民の反感を買い、ギロチンで処刑されてしまう！かと思いきや、一年前に戻っていて、何度やっても死んでは戻るを繰り返すマリー。

処刑エンドを回避するためには、「女難」となる無数の女を攻略しなければならないと知ったマリーは、持ち前の”カリスマ性”を駆使し、百合ハーレムを築き上げることを決意する!

死に戻り王女によるサバイバル百合ファンタジー、開幕!

altTitles.ja: 師匠、あと49回死んでください

description.en:
When the powerless thirteenth prince became emperor, he gave his tutor, Yo Yohwa, poison. His reason being his death at the hands of his own master in countless previous lives. The poisoned Yo Yohwa then regresses to an earlier time together with the prince and is determined to get on his good side this time in order to escape. However, the prince already discovered the truth…

“This is crazy. You killed me in the previous lives, and you neglected me in another. Now you’re acting all nice. Are you trying to get away?”

title.en: Tobioriru Chokuzen no Doukyuusei ni "Sekkusu Shiyou! ” To Teianshite Mita.

altTitles.ja: 飛び降りる直前の同級生に『セックスしよう！』と提案してみた。

altTitles.id: Sesaat Sebelum Melompat, Aku menyarankan Teman Sekelasku, "Yuk, Ngewe!"

altTitles.en: Just Before Jumping, I Suggested to my Classmate, "Let's Have Sex!"

description.en:
A shocking romantic comedy has arrived! 
My first love, Koga Kurumi. Her beauty and personality, which are beyond what you'd expect from a high school student, invite jealousy, isolate her, and - she was on the verge of jumping off the roof due to bullying. So, what can I do...? 
"Let's have sex!" 
I'll scream out my love to the death and make a place for you in this world!
description.id: Dialah cinta pertamaku, Koga Kurumi. Kecantikan dan kepribadiannya di luar ekspektasi dari seorang murid SMA, membuat keirian, pengucilan,dan membuatnya hampir melompat dari atap sekolah karena perundungan. Lantas, apa yang bisa kulakukan? "Yuk, ngewe!". Akan kuteriakkan cintaku padamu hingga akhir nyawa dan membuatkanmu tempat di dunia ini!

title.en: Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 痣だらけのクラスメイトが心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Classmate Who's Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pt-br: Estou preocupado com minha colega de classe coberta de hematomas

altTitles.ro: Sunt îngrijorat Pentru o Colegă Acoperită de Vânătăi

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей однокласснице покрытой синяками

altTitles.tr: Her Tarafı Bandaj Kaplı Olan Sınıf Arkadaşım Hakkında Endişeleniyorum

altTitles.vi: Tôi lo lắng cho người bạn cùng lớp đầy những vết bầm tím

altTitles.uk: Я турбуюсь про однокласницю, покриту синцями

altTitles.ja: 痣だらけのクラスメイト

altTitles.en: My Classmate Who's Covered in Bruises

altTitles.th: เพื่อนนักเรียนของผมที่มีรอยขีดข่วนเต็มตัวไปหมด

description.en:
A girl in my class is always injured somewhere on her body, and it's not unusual for her to come to school covered in bandages. At a glance, one can tell that this girl is saddled with problems and so no one tries to get involved with her. Even so... I couldn't help myself from being concerned about her.

This is a story about a pair of classmates whose hearts will be brought together under extreme circumstances.

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

Note: The original Twitter series has been collected and published into 1 volume under the name Azadarake no Classmate (痣だらけのクラスメイト) by Kadokawa through their Dengeki Comics EX label.

Additional Links

* [Kadokawa](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322312000753/) (Publisher)
* [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20079655/vol_no/001)
description.ja:
総「いいね」数300万超！
SNSで大反響の、痛々しくも温かい限界ラブコメーー大幅加筆で待望の書籍化！

いつもどこかを怪我していて、
包帯姿で学校にくることも珍しくないクラスの女子。
見るからに問題を抱えた彼女に
クラスの誰もが関わりを持とうとしなかった。
だけど……俺はどうしても
その子のことが気になってしまって……。
限界の環境で心を寄せる二人の物語。

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

altTitles.en: Akanabe-sensei Doesn't Know about Embarrassment

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.ja: 『崎枝君ってさ私のこと好き？』　憧れの漫画家・茜部アキラのもとでアシスタントとして働く崎枝コウキ。憧れが次第に恋心へと変わっていたある日、まさかの両想いであることがわかり、なんと二人は恋人同士に！　しかし、茜部先生は思った事を口にしちゃう上に照れ知らずで、コウキを褒め殺してくる！
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com elegância.

title.en: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shite shimatta...

altTitles.ja: Bakarina

altTitles.en: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!

altTitles.ja: Hamefura

altTitles.en: Destruction Flag Otome
I Reincarnated into an Otome Game as a Villainess With Only Destruction Flags...

altTitles.ja: 乙女ゲームの破滅フラグしかない悪役令嬢に転生してしまった...

altTitles.de: My Next Life as a Villainess: Wie überlebe ich in einem Dating-Game?

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生成女性向遊戲只有毀滅END的壞人大小姐

altTitles.zh: 转生成为了只有乙女游戏破灭Flag的邪恶大小姐

description.en: I recovered my past memories when I was hit on the head by a rock. I am Katarina Claes, the eight year old daughter of the duke. In a feverish nightmare, in which the prince’s fiancee was determined, I have realized that this is the otome game from the previous life. Also, I have turned into the villainess that interfered with the romance of the capture targets… If the heroine got a happy end, I would be exiled, while if she got a bad end, I would be killed by the capture target… I have no happy end!? Why is it only bad!? Somehow I have to avoid the destruction end, and reach old age peacefully!!

altTitles.ja: 地獄の戦鬼

altTitles.fr: Jigoku no Senki – Le Démon Funeste

altTitles.it: Jigoku no Senki, Il Demone Funesto

altTitles.en: Jigoku no Senki - The Lethal Demon
The Hell's War Demon

description.en: Jigoku no Senki is an erotically charged noir/action series written by Shiro Azuma and illustrated by Toshio Maeda that was originally serialized  in 1977 under the title "Taxi Driver" but underwent a title change (feel free to speculate as to why) for its 3 volume tankoubon release in 1981. The story is about a former police detective who works as a taxi driver in order to keep his daughter on life support. He isn’t just a taxi driver, though, but also an extremely efficient hitman and he has a personal score to settle...

altTitles.ja: はぴはぴあ！

description.en: Yuki Iwatsuki is a transfer student, today is her first day at her new school. There seems to be some kind of trauma, her classmates “Koneko,” a high-tension girl, and “Akizora Hako,” a box-head girl, are very interested in Yuki! Will she get along with everyone?

title.en: The Lazy Lord Masters the Sword

altTitles.en: Reformation of the Deadbeat Noble
The Lazy Prince Becomes a Genius

altTitles.ru: От нерадивого аристократа до усердного гения

altTitles.ja: 怠惰公子、努力の天才になる

description.en:
After witnessing the shocking death of his mother, young Airen Farreira uses sleep to escape his painful reality, earning him the nickname, “the lazy lord”. Yet, in spite of others’ jeers and whispers, Airen has no intention of changing his ways.

But when he awakens one day from a dream about a mysterious swordsman, his life’s trajectory takes a complete turn...

---
- [Alternative English Translation (Tappytoon)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-lazy-lord-masters-the-sword)
description.fr: Irene Perreira est un garçon qui dort pour s’enfuir de la réalité. Les gens se moquent de lui, en l’appelant 'bon à rien' , mais il n'a aucune envie de changer. Jusqu'à ce qu'un jour, il rêva d'un épéiste... C'était un rêve d'un homme sans talent qui a entraîné ses mouvements à l'épée pendant des décennies.
description.ja: 誰も期待していなかった一族の怠け者、アイルーンパレイラがついに剣を手に取る。
description.ko:
잠을 도피처로 삼아 온 소년 아이른 파레이라.
사람들은 그를 나태 공자라 부르며 조롱했지만 그는 변할 생각이 없었다.
어느 날 어느 검사의 꿈을 꾸기 전까지는...
그것은 그저 묵묵히 수십 년간 검을 휘두르며 단련하는 한 재능 없는 사내에 관한 꿈이었다.
description.ru:
Юный Айрон Парейра сделал свой мир грёз убежищем от боли трагедии прошлого. Людей забавляло это, они подняли его на смех и прозвали нерадивым аристократом. Однако подобное отношение никак не задевало нашего героя необходимостью меняться.
Так бы всё и продолжалось, не повстречай он во сне бездарного юношу, который тридцать семь лет подряд обучался владению мечом, да так и умер с оружием в руках.
description.zh-hk: 家族中的懶惰蟲終於拿起了劍！將睡覺視為逃避方法的少年艾倫．帕雷拉，即使人們都嘲笑他為懶惰公子，他依然不願改變，直到有天他夢見了一位數十年間不斷揮劍鍛練的無才男子...

altTitles.en: Precarious Female Executive Miss Black General
Precarious Woman Executive Miss Black General

altTitles.ja: 残念女幹部ブラックジェネラルさん

altTitles.es-la: La Precaria Mujer Ejecutiva Señorita General Black

description.en: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.
description.es-la: La General Black es la líder de una organización secreta que quiere dominar al mundo. Por desgracia también esta loca por Braveman un superhéroe dedicado a frustrar los malvados planes de esta organización. Entonces, ¿Cómo exactamente va a conquistar el mundo cuando ni siquiera puede conquistar sus propios sentimientos? ¿Y cómo va a responder Braveman a este extraño giro?
description.pt-br: Braveman é um super herói como qualquer outro. Infelizmente pra ele, sua arqui-inimiga é sua stalker e sua fã número 1. Acompanhe as aventuras de Braveman e sua luta incansável contra seu maior adversário enquanto tenta não perder a cabeça.

title.en: The Duke's Daughter Is Going on Strike

altTitles.en: The Princess Is Going on Strike From Now on
The Princess Is Going on Strike

description.en:
Aeryl Frey Brixia had lived all her life hiding behind a mask.

She was shunned by everyone including the father she craved affection from because of the ugly mark on her face that branded her a monster.

At the end of her miserable life, she was falsely accused of selling military weapons to the enemy nation and sentenced to execution…

The blade of the guillotine dropped and everything went black.

The next time she opened her eyes, she was in her room again as a young girl.

This time, she was determined things will be different. She will no longer be a puppet. She will no longer be manipulated.

And the first thing for her to do is to cooperate with the two officers leading the investigation against her father

title.en: Chounin A wa Akuyaku Reijou wo Doushitemo Sukuitai

altTitles.ja: 町人Aは悪役令嬢をどうしても救いたい～どぶと空と氷の姫君～

altTitles.en: Villager A Wants to Save the Villainess no Matter What!

altTitles.ru: Крестьянин хочет спасти злодейку любой ценой!

altTitles.vi: Dù là phản diện những tôi vẫn muốn giúp cô ấy

altTitles.id: Penduduk Desa A Ingin Menyelamatkan Tokoh Antagonis Apapun yang Terjadi!

description.en:
Allen, an eight-year-old boy from a poor family in the royal capital, is living a poor but happy life together with his mother. One day, however, memories of his previous life suddenly come back to him and he remembers that he is in an dating sim game and that the capital will be destroyed by war if he doesn’t do something about it. If this continues, both he and his mother will be killed! 

With a sense of urgency, he decides to rise to the occasion in order to save his precious mother’s life and save his favorite character, the villainous young lady Anastasia, the only girl he liked in the game, from her all too tragic and ruinous end.

This is the story of a man who isn’t even a character in the game, but who strives with his steely determination and uses all the knowledge he has to turn overcome fate!
description.ja: モブ以下"町人A"、家族のために悪役令嬢を救う⁉ 乙女ゲーム世界にモブ以下の存在として転生したアレン。記憶を取り戻し、数年後にヒロインのせいで街ごと蹂躙され、自分も家族も滅んでしまう!と気づき一念発起。前世のゲーム知識(チート)を駆使して成り上がることに。どぶさらいなど地道な努力とチートの結果Cランク冒険者となり、いよいよ学園入学――本来ならば学園に入ることも許されない町人Aに悪役令嬢は救えるのか?ヒロイン対町人Aの戦いがスタート!第2回アース・スターノベル大賞、佳作受賞作待望の書籍化
description.ru:
Аллен, восьмилетний мальчик из бедной семьи в королевской столице, живет бедной, но счастливой жизнью вместе со своей матерью. Однако однажды к нему внезапно возвращаются воспоминания о его прошлой жизни, и он вспоминает, что находится в симуляторе свиданий и что столица будет разрушена войной, если он ничего с этим не сделает.

Если так будет продолжаться, и он, и его мать будут убиты!

С чувством срочности он решает воспользоваться случаем, чтобы спасти жизнь своей драгоценной матери и спасти своего любимого персонажа, злодейскую юную леди Анастасию, единственную девушку, которая ему нравилась в игре, от ее слишком трагического и разрушительного конца.

Это история человека, который даже не является персонажем игры, но который борется со своей стальной решимостью и использует все имеющиеся у него знания, чтобы повернуть судьбу вспять!
description.vi:
Allen, 8 tuổi, sống trong một hoàn cảnh nghèo khó nhưng hạnh phúc với mẹ của mình. Một hôm nọ, ký ức tiền kiếp quay về. Thế giới này thực ra là một game giả lập hẹn hò và nơi cậu sống sẽ bị hủy diệt nếu như cậu không làm gì đó

Thế nên cậu quyết định giúp đỡ nữ phản diện trong game để cứu lấy cô khỏi kết thảm và cũng để cứu mẹ của mình

Đây là một câu chuyện về một nhân vật thậm chí chẳng tồn tại trong game, trên con đường lật kèo bằng ý chí và kiến thức của mình!

altTitles.ja: 気絶勇者と暗殺姫

altTitles.vi: Dũng giả gục ngã và Công chúa sát thủ

altTitles.en: The Fainting Hero and the Assassin Princesses

description.en: Toto is a novice hero who has finally put together the team that he'd always wanted. And he's ready to set out on a new adventure. But Toto's new party members' actual target is... his life?!

altTitles.ja: 渚のサーメイド

altTitles.es-la: La Maid Tiburón de la Costa

altTitles.en: Shark Maid on the Shore
Shark Maid of the Shore

description.en:
Wataru is a lonely boy who lost his parents in an accident. For some reason, there is one maid—her name is Kosame, and she has been by his side since he was little. Yes, she never changed... Set in a unique coastal fishing village with rows of houses called "boathouses," a love story of eternal love begins! (MTL)

---

- Alternative Official Raw - [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM05203826010000_68) and [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/62407)
description.ja: 事故で両親を亡くした天涯孤独な少年のワタル。そんな彼と何故かともに暮らす親代わりのメイドさんがひとり。彼女の名前はこさめといい、ワタルが小さなころからずっと変わらずそばにいる。そう、姿も変わらずずっと……。
description.es-la:
Wataru es un chico solitario que perdió a sus padres en un accidente. Por alguna razón tiene una maid que comienza a vivir con él en lugar de sus padres. Su nombre es Kosame y siempre ha estado al lado de Wataru desde que este era pequeño. Y sí, siempre ha tenido el mismo aspecto… 
Ambientada en un pueblo pesquero con hileras de casas llamadas Funaya, ¡Aquí es donde comienza esta historia de amor y persecución por el “Amor Eterno”!

altTitles.ja: おやすみプンプン

description.en:
Punpun Onodera is a normal 11-year-old boy living in Japan. Hopelessly idealistic and romantic, Punpun begins to see his life take a subtle—though nonetheless startling—turn to the adult when he meets the new girl in his class, Aiko Tanaka. It is then that the quiet boy learns just how fickle maintaining a relationship can be, and the surmounting difficulties of transitioning from a naïve boyhood to a convoluted adulthood. When his father assaults his mother one night, Punpun realizes another thing: those whom he looked up to were not as impressive as he once thought.  
  
As his problems increase, Punpun's once shy demeanor turns into voluntary reclusiveness. Rather than curing him of his problems and conflicting emotions, this merely intensifies them, sending him down the dark path of maturity in this grim coming-of-age saga.
description.sr:
Laku noć, Punpune priča o odrastanju običnog klinca u gradu kao i svakom drugom. Njegova porodica je disfunkcionalna, nije najbistriji ni najmarljiviji đak i jedino što mu ide od ruke je što može da razgovara sa Bogom kada god to poželi. Ipak, sve to će se promeniti kada u njegovo odeljenje dođe Aiko, a iz njegovog doma odu roditelji.

Punpun želi da osvoji Nobelovu nagradu i spasi svet.
Punpun želi da se njegovi ne svađaju toliko.
Punpun želi da se dopadne svojoj simpatiji.
Pazi šta želiš, Punpune.

„Laku noć, Punpune je uspeo ono što su retki planetarno popularni serijali doživeli, a to je da prevaziđe svoju nametnutu ciljanu publiku (tinejdžeri i mladići) i postane manga van žanra, manga iz koje mladi upijaju i uče dok se stariji podsećaju i prihvataju.“

– Aleksandar Nešić, sa websajta Lagune
description.uk: Онодера Пунпун — звичайний японський 11-річний хлопчик. Його безнадійно ідеалістичні та наївні погляди на життя починають повільно, та все ж неминуче змінюватися, коли до його класу переходить нова дівчина - Танака Аіко. Пунпун дізнається наскільки непостійними можуть бути стосунки, наскільки важким може бути дорослішання і наскільки сильно світ відрізняється від того, яким він його колись уявляв.

Pixiv Extras and After Story of Zenbu Kimi no Sei.
Mainly centred around Ryou and Nagisa.

description.en: Ryutaro Hando is a figure prototype maker, a person who creates the basis for mass production of figures. He is a skilled but somewhat socially awkward member of the workshop he has joined. This yonkoma story can be enjoyed by both figure lovers and those who are not interested in figures.
description.ja: 半藤隆太郎は個人で活動するフィギュア原型師。原型師とはフィギュアなどの大量生産の元になるものを作る人で、腕は確かだが、少々人付き合いが苦手な彼が入った工房のメンバーは見た目子供の工房代表、美少女好き、クリーチャー好きと超個性的で、彼らは、手先は器用、でも生き方は不器用。フィギュア好きも、フィギュアに関心がなくても楽しめるワイド４コマ。

altTitles.es: El hombre de un solo golpe

altTitles.en: One Punch Man
One-Punch Man
OPM

altTitles.ja: ワンパンマン

altTitles.th: วันพันช์แมน

altTitles.en: Onepunch-Man

description.en:
After rigorously training for three years, the ordinary Saitama has gained immense strength which allows him to take out anyone and anything with just one punch. He decides to put his new skill to good use by becoming a hero. However, he quickly becomes bored with easily defeating monsters, and wants someone to give him a challenge to bring back the spark of being a hero.  
  
Upon bearing witness to Saitama's amazing power, Genos, a cyborg, is determined to become Saitama's apprentice. During this time, Saitama realizes he is neither getting the recognition that he deserves nor known by the people due to him not being a part of the Hero Association. Wanting to boost his reputation, Saitama decides to have Genos register with him, in exchange for taking him in as a pupil. Together, the two begin working their way up toward becoming true heroes, hoping to find strong enemies and earn respect in the process.  
  



---

**Notes:**  
- Because some groups use the web version of the manga while others use the magazine version, the numbering won't match between different languages.  
- **Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of One Punch Man are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-punch-man) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**
description.fa: در جهان اَبَر قهرمان ها قهرمانی بسیار قدرتمند و شکست ناپذیر وجود داره که به (مرد تک مشتی) معروفه چون اون تمامی دشمنان و رقیب هاشو فقط با یک مشت از میدان به در میکنه. بعد از مدتی سایتاما  دیگه از مبارزاتش لذت نمیبره و احساساتی مثل هیجان و ترس رو در خودش فراموش میکنه! و همراه تنها شاگردش که یک سایبورگ هست به انتظار رقیبی خوب ، ماجراهایی رو دنبال میکنن و……
description.ru: Манга повествует о молодом человеке по имени Сайтама. Он — герой, обычный герой. Основная его проблема в том, что он вышибает дух из злодеев одним ударом. А это очень скучно…
description.tr:
Üç yıllık sıkı bir eğitimden sonra, Saitama, tek bir yumrukla herkesi ve her şeyi alt etmesine izin veren muazzam bir güç kazandı. Bir kahraman olarak yeni becerisini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. Bununla birlikte, canavarları kolayca yenmekten çabucak sıkılır ve kahraman olma kıvılcımını geri getirmek için birinin ona meydan okumasını ister.
  Bir cyborg olan Genos, Saitama'nın inanılmaz gücüne tanık olduktan sonra, Saitama'nın çırağı olmaya kararlıdır. Bu süre zarfında Saitama, Kahraman Derneği'nin bir parçası olmadığı için ne hak ettiği takdiri görmediğini ne de insanlar tarafından tanınmadığını fark eder. İtibarını artırmak isteyen Saitama, Genos'u öğrenci olarak alması karşılığında kendisine kaydettirmeye karar verir. İkisi birlikte, güçlü düşmanlar bulmayı ve bu süreçte saygı kazanmayı umarak gerçek kahramanlar olma yolunda ilerlemeye başlar.
description.pt-br: One-Punch Man conta a história de Saitama, um super-herói extremamente poderoso, que se entediou com a ausência dos desafios nas suas lutas contra o mau e procura encontrar um oponente digno para lutar.

altTitles.en: My Feelings Can Wait

description.en:
During the wedding of the famous actress, Jing Xiu, Weibo was flooded instead by the shocking headline "New Hit Actress Ji Youyan Dies of Alcohol Poisoning". The headlines were soon changed when the wedding was called off... for reasons unknown.

Ji Youyan suddenly wakes up three years back in time, two years after she broke up with Jing Xiu. This time, she swears to never lose her again...

title.en: The Reborn Young Lord Is an Assassin

altTitles.en: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
The Regressed Youngest Son of the Duke Is an Assassin

altTitles.es: El asesino que retornó como el hijo del Duque
El pibe que retorna como el hijo menor

altTitles.th: ลูกชายคนเล็กของดยุกคือมือสังหาร

altTitles.es-la: La venganza del asesino de la espada demoniaca

description.en:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

altTitles.en: Homeless
I Have No Home

altTitles.ja: 家がない！

description.en:
Haejoon Goh, who ran from home, and Eunyung Baek, the problem child who lives in a tent.   
These two, who met under terrible circumstances, are forced to live together in an abandoned dormitory.   
This is a story of difficult growth between two people who hate both the dorm and each other.

altTitles.ja: ヴィンランド・サガ

description.en:
As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery… the land Leif called Vinland.  

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**
description.ru: Эта история случилась в начале XI века, когда викинги, безраздельно господствовавшие в северных морях, грабили побережья Франции и Англии. В эпоху, где оружие значило больше, нежели слова, маленький мальчик невольно оказывается косвенной причиной гибели своего отца. Повзрослев и став на путь воина, он жаждет честного поединка с убийцей отца – легендарным главарём отряда викингов-наемников, но возраст и отсутствие опыта не позволяют ему сделать это. Чтобы не упускать своего врага из виду, юноша вступает в его отряд и в награду за выполнение тяжелого боевого задания требует поединка с ним, но терпит поражение. Юноша продолжает прилагать все усилия, чтобы осуществить свою месть. Внезапно он оказывается вовлечён в куда более кровавое столкновение…
description.tr: Çocukken Thorfinn, büyük Leif Ericson'un ayaklarının dibinde oturur ve batıdaki uzak diyarların vahşi masallarıyla heyecanlanırdı. Ama gençlik hayalleri bir paralı asker baskınıyla paramparça oldu. Ailesini öldüren Vikingler tarafından yetiştirilen Thorfinn, grubun lideri Askeladd'ı öldürmek ve babasının intikamını almak isteyen korkunç bir savaşçı oldu. Thorfinn'i çileli yaşamı boyunca ayakta tutan, ailesiyle olan gururu ve batıdaki bereketli topraklara, savaşın ve köleliğin olmadığı bir ülkeye, Leif'in Vinland adını verdiği topraklara dair hayalleridir.
description.pt-br: Thorfinn é filho de Thors, um lendário guerreiro viking, mas que após anos no campo de batalha, descobre uma coisa mais maravilhosa que matar seus iguais. Viver sua própria vida, em paz. Mas os ventos lhe trazem uma notícia que atrapalhará seus dias de paz, e Thorfinn, seu filho, pouco sabe desta vida passada de guerra de seu pai. Após descobrir o passado de seu pai, Thorfinn se revolta contra ele, e sai para a guerra junto de seu pai, mas quando reconhece o verdadeiro valor dele, já é tarde demais. Agora Thorfinn deverá seguir sua própria vida, seguindo valores que seu pai lhe ensinou, mas sem perder sua coragem. Este é só o começo desta grande saga de Thorfinn que acompanha os Vikings no século XI!

description.en: Low-grade guide, Qin Yun is forcibly marked by divine-grade sentry tyrant Mersherie. An aggressive maiden-heart seme x serious straightforward uke start an unbashful and unabashed companion life, conquering the whole universe while at it.

altTitles.en: There Is No Place for Fakes
No Place for the Fake Princess

altTitles.ja: ニセモノ皇女の居場所はない

description.en:
Philomel—the fake princess—conspires with her mother to impersonate the imperial princess and cause a war between the Mage Tower and the Empire.
Once her crimes were exposed, she was sentenced to execution.
A death truly befitting of a wicked—

“Even if the Philomel within the book had done some wrong, it wasn’t enough to warrant death!”

Philomel yelled and threw the book she'd been reading.
She had simply been curious about a book she'd picked up in the garden, but the contents of the book stated that she would die!
Although she wanted to believe it was nothing but fiction, everything that happened from that moment onwards went just like in the book.

“Since it has come to this… my goal is to survive!”

Will Philomel be able to discover the origins of the suspicious book and live on?

---
After finding a mysterious book in the imperial garden, Princess Philomel not only discovers that the book's villain shares her name, but that other events in the story are coming true too. Now, she believes that she's an imposter and that the real princess will take her rightful place, leading to the execution of Philomel the Fake! So to avoid a tragic death, she has to make sure the rest of the book doesn't come true. Can this fake princess change what's already been written?
description.fr:
Philomel — la fausse princesse — complote avec sa mère pour se faire passer pour la princesse impériale et provoquer une guerre entre la Tour des Mages et l'Empire. Une fois ses crimes exposés, elle est condamnée à l'exécution. Une mort vraiment digne d'une méchante...

‘Même si la Philomel du livre a fait quelque chose de mal, ce n'est pas assez pour justifier la mort!»

Philomel a crié et a jeté le livre qu'elle lisait. Elle avait simplement été curieuse à propos d'un livre qu'elle avait ramassé dans le jardin, mais le contenu du livre disait qu'elle allait mourir! Bien qu'elle ait voulu croire que ce n'était que de la fiction, tout ce qui s'est passé à partir de ce moment-là s'est déroulé comme dans le livre.

«Puisqu'on en est arrivé là... mon but est de survivre!»

Philomel parviendra-t-elle à découvrir les origines du livre suspect et à survivre?
description.id: Setelah bersekongkol dengan ibunya dan memicu perang antara kekaisaran dan menara sihir, Philomel si 'putri palsu' dihukum mati atas semua kejahatannya... Begitulah isi dari buku mencurigakan yang dipungut oleh Philomel di taman. Ia ingin memercayai bahwa cerita di dalam buku itu hanyalah fiksi, tapi semakin hari kejadian di dunia nyata semakin menyerupai buku itu. Agar tidak bernasib sama dengan Philomel yang ada di dalam buku, Philomel memutuskan untuk berusaha bertahan hidup. Akankah hidupnya berjalan sama seperti dengan buku mencurigakan itu?
description.pl:
Philomel - fałszywa księżniczka - spiskowała ze swoją matką, by podszyć się pod cesarską księżniczkę i wywołać wojnę między Wieżą Magów, a Imperium.
Gdy jej zbrodnie zostały ujawnione, została skazana na śmierć.
Konic godny nikczemnika...
"Nawet jeśli Philomel z książki zrobiła coś złego, to nie było to wystarczające, aby uzasadnić wyrok śmierci!"
Philomel krzyknęła i rzuciła książkę, którą czytała.
Była po prostu ciekawa książki, którą znalazła w ogrodzie, ale jej treść mówiła, że umrze!
Choć chciała wierzyć, że to nic innego jak bajka, wszystko, co wydarzyło się od tego momentu, przebiegało dokładnie tak, jak w książce.
"Skoro do tego doszło... moim celem jest przetrwanie!".
Czy Philomel uda się odkryć pochodzenie podejrzanej książki i żyć dalej?
description.pt-br: Philomel, a 'princesa falsa' que conspirou com sua mãe para se passar por princesa imperial, causou uma guerra ao separar a Torre Mágica do Império. Quando ela é considerada culpada de todos os seus crimes, ela é condenada à morte. Realmente digna de uma vilã... "Eu, não, Philomel no livro fiz algo errado, então não é o suficiente para me matar!" Philomel gritou e jogou o livro que estava lendo. Ela estava apenas curiosoa sobre o livro suspeito que pegou no jardim, mas ela, não, a princesa Philomel do livro morreu! Quero acreditar que é apenas uma ficção, mas de alguma forma tudo o que acontece depois se assemelha ao que está escrito no livro. "Agora que está assim... meu único objetivo é sobreviver!" Philomel será capaz de revelar o que aquele livro suspeito diz e reivindicar sua vida?

description.en:
When vlogger meets top-of-the-industry writer, what could go wrong? Everything! Nothing has gone my way ever since meeting her.

Hu Luoluo, on the brink of having her vlogger account relinquished, is shoved into the path of scandal-ridden writer extraordinaire Song Li purely by accident. Being featured on hot topics, paired up as a couple, finally gaining traffic... Will it finally make her the greatest vlogger of all time?
description.es-la: Juntos o se hunden juntos, ¿se descubrirán mentiras sobre el amor? Están ligados por negocios, fingiendo ser pareja para contrarrestar los escándalos del escritor y lograr ser el primer lugar en el buscador.

altTitles.ja: 天井からメデューサが降ってくる話

Tenjou kara Medusa ga Futtekuru Hanashi

altTitles.en: Good day to you, how about a game?

description.en: At a prestigious girls' school, Sae, a shy high schooler didn't fit in with her classmates. Her daily routine during lunch break consists of playing her Mahjong game on her phone. Due to her hobby being maybe too old-fashioned, she kept it a secret, until she was found out by her class' charismatic rich lady, Chise! Will they with their diametrically different personalities get along through playing Mahjong...?

altTitles.en: Depths of Malice

description.en:
"Proud Carter, it's all thanks to you my life has been ruined!" Rita, a lady of a noble, became a bar waitress with limited lifespan because of him. There are many days when she wants revenge, but doesn't have a blade to hold on to. 

One day, A foreign shaman suggested to Rita, "I will exchange your old body for a new one.", with the shaman's magic, Rita, the Countess's daughter, was able to be reborn as Bertha Alberthart.

---
- [Original Webtoon R15 version <RidiBooks>](https://ridibooks.com/books/1716001591)

altTitles.ja: ホワイトナイトビターポルノ

description.en:
"Please let me take responsibility!!"

Rui, a pharmacist, is a sexual pleasure seeker. One day, he brings a completely drunk virgin, Takanashi, back to his place. Although they were extremely compatible sexually, Rui leaves the hotel, thinking it was his usual one-night stand.

However, to his surprise, Takanashi says, "It looks like I fell in love with you, Rui-san.", and begins his aggressive pursuit. Despite being a bit put off by Takanashi's almost-stalker-like affection, which includes getting a part-time job at Rui's workplace while constantly checking up on him, Rui's heart begins to waver as he sees Takanashi's sincere devotion to him...

title.en: Isekai Furin ll ~Michibika Reshi Hitodzuma Tachi to Bukiyo Tensei Yuusha~

altTitles.ja: 異世界不倫Ⅱ～導かれし人妻たちと不器用転生勇者～

altTitles.en: Otherworld Affair II
Isekai Affair 2
Isekai Furin Part 2

description.en:
An office worker, Yuuto Aida, witnesses his wife's affair at home!  When he jumps out of the house, he gets hit by a truck and is reincarnated in another world as a hero!!  However, due to the misunderstanding about Goddess Reincarnation, he only had one skill, it was a skill that could captivate other people's wives!!

(MTL)
description.id: Suami sibuk bekerja Istri sibuk selingkuh, Seorang pekerja kantoran, Yuuto Aida, menyaksikan perselingkuhan istrinya di rumahnya! Ketika dia melompat keluar rumah, dia ditabrak truk dan bereinkarnasi di dunia lain sebagai pahlawan!! Namun, karena kesalahpahaman tentang Reinkarnasi Dewi, dia hanya punya satu skill, itu adalah skill yang dapat memikat istri orang lain!!
description.ja: ごくごく普通のサラリーマン・愛田勇人（あいだ　ゆうと）は、自宅で妻の浮気現場を目撃！家を飛び出したところ、“例のトラック”に轢かれ──勇者として異世界転生することに！！しかし、転生の女神のひょんな勘違いから、たったひとつのスキルだけを彼は手に入れることになった──　それは、“人妻完全魅了（チャーム）”というスキル！世の人妻は皆すべて、彼に魅了される！！！！

altTitles.en: Requiem of the Shinsengumi
Requiem for Shinsen

altTitles.ja: ちるらん 新撰組鎮魂歌【レクイエム】

description.en: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.
description.pt-br: Em 1912, uma jovem mulher rastreia o idoso Nagakura Shinpachi, determinada a ouvir a verdadeira história do Demônio do Shinsengumi, o Vice-Comandante Hijikata Toshizou. A história de Hijikata começa em 1859, quando ele é um jovem violento que está aprimorando suas habilidades com a espada enquanto vende os remédios de sua família. Logo, em sua busca para encontrar pessoas mais fortes para lutar, Hijikata começa a entrar em contato com outros que eventualmente se tornarão seus companheiros no Shinsengumi. O primeiro a causar uma impressão no jovem impetuoso é Kondo Isami, que prova ser um lutador melhor do que Hijikata.

description.en:
The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. 

Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took. 

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.
description.ko:
줄거리

평범한 대학생으로 살아가던 성수호 죽음을 앞둔 순간, 잠들어 있던 그의 특별한 혈통이 깨어난다!

“일어나라.”

죽음을 거스르고 지배하는 헌터, 그가 선보이는 새로운 레벨업을 주목하라!

* 이 작품은 웹툰 <나 혼자만 레벨업>의 세계관을 이어받은 작품입니다.
description.pt-br:
A existência da Terra está ameaçada novamente, por Itarim, os deuses de outros universos, buscam preencher o vazio deixado pelo Ser Absoluto.

Sung Jinwoo não tem outra opção senão enviar Beru, o rei das formigas das sombras, para despertar os poderes de seu filho e iniciar sua jornada, como ele fez antes.

Suho precisa conquistar a masmorra das sombras e ganhar seu lugar no mundo dos caçadores, enquanto enfrenta um novo mal que ameaça engolir o mundo inteiro.
